subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Top-ranked Rafael Nadal rallied from a 3-0 deficit in the first set Saturday to beat Juan Martín del Potro, 6-4, 6-4, to advance to the BNP Paribas Open final in Indian Wells, Calif.
snippet: Top-ranked Rafael Nadal rallied from a 3-0 deficit in the first set Saturday to beat Juan Martín del Potro, 6-4, 6-4, to advance to the BNP Paribas Open final in Indian Wells, Calif.
